And in fact, I can now consistently maintain 60 steps per minute for over an hour, even with a backpack â€” thatâ€™s 720 meters of elevation gain per hour.

Distance Training

To simulate that in the gym, I would have to stand on a treadmill for about 11 hours, and somehow that just feels silly. So instead, I head out into nature and just go.

In March, I already completed a somewhat longer tour (27.4 km and 720 meters of elevation gain) quite well.
